name: Ropalolyst
description:
'Known and unknowable. This thing has haunted my life, waking and asleep, ever since I made that accursed bargain. A parasite at the core of my city. It drains my wealth, my power, my reactorsâ€¦ and my dignity.
This will not stand. I will see that horrendous thing destroyed.
I will be free.'
Alad V
